name: MINI LUST: GLOSS™ DUO LIMITED RELEASE: NUDE MOOD
about: What it is:A limited-edition set of two miniature LUST: Lip Glosses in bestselling neutral shades, Flesh 6 and Nude Venus...Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, phthalates, and sulfates SLS & SLES. These products are also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Drench your lips in high shine with this mini duo of LUST: Lip Gloss, a balm-like formula that moisturizes lips and visibly smooths fine lines to create a fuller-looking pout. This set features two neutral hues, Flesh 6, a rich rose brown, and Nude Venus, a warm-pink nude with gold pearl..This Set Contains:
ingredients: Flesh 6:.Polybutene, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Isostearyl Isostearate, Synthetic Wax, Polyglyceryl-2 Tetraisostearate, Hydrogenated Styrene/Methyl Styrene/Indene Copolymer, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Silica, Mica, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Ethyl Vanillin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Propylene Carbonate, Tin Oxide, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tocopherol, (+/-): Iron Oxides (Cl 77491, CI 77492), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410)...Nude Venus:.Polybutene, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Isostearyl Isostearate, Synthetic Wax, Polyglyceryl-2 Tetraisostearate, Hydrogenated Styrene/Methyl Styrene/Indene Copolymer, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Silica, Mica, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Calcium Titanium Borosilicate, Propylene Carbonate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Ethyl Vanillin, Tocopherol, Tin Oxide, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Drench your lips with the LUST: Lip Gloss shades for ultimate lip luxury..-Use these mouthwatering shades of translucent, addictive color with PAT McGRATH LABS’ PermaGel Ultra Lip Pencil (sold separately) to create your own layered lip looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a cute set, and the shade Flesh 6 is so perfect. I've been wearing it non-stop. I also love this formula, doesn't feel heavy or sticky on the lips at all and gives a beautiful glossy shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really liked this set! The red gloss is very pigmented and lasts a long time. I had it on for over 45 min and it didn’t smudge. The nude gloss isn’t my fav color but I can make it work. Overall good set for the holidays!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Both shades are very complimentary for my complexion. Longevity is solid and the formula is nice and creamy. Has a lovely light scent that dissipates quickly. Overall pretty solid choice!
